title: Red Blend Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, July 2, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a bold and expressive tasting featuring four powerhouse red blends from California. From fruit-driven to structured and complex, these wines highlight the creativity and balance of blended varietals.

Tasting Fee: $30 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

  • Prisoner Red Blend 2022 – Bright and smooth with ripe raspberry, blackberry, pomegranate, vanilla, and a long, luscious finish.
  • Leviathan Red Blend 2022 – 92 pts, Robert Parker. Full-bodied and fruit-forward with cassis, black cherry, and a velvety texture.
  • Harvey & Harriet Red Blend 2021 – 93 pts, James Suckling. Rich and ripe with blackcurrants, violets, black olives, and polished tannins.
  • DAOU Pessimist Red Blend 2023 – Bold and lush with blueberry, kirsch, roasted coffee, spice, and a silky, balanced finish.

Taste through the dynamic world of red blends—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
